name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vi Subtitle: Add Live Captions to Any Webpage

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vi Subtitle - Add Live Captions for your watching video or speech with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate Subtitles with AI,  Add Live Captions for your watching video or speech.(Chrome126 and above)

Main features of the extension:
1) Add Live Captions with On-Device AI Model
2) Transcribe and translate between English, Chinese, Japanese,French and 10+ languages
3) Support download and save subtitles text

This Tool has a powerful feature which could be useful for Online Videos, Metting & Online Courses, Live Streaming...

How to:
- Add the extension to your Chrome browser
- Go to webpage, You want add live captions
- Open pop-up ( load model for first start ) and switch on Live Caption .
- Select Origin language or translate language you want  , Done.

Recommand Device: Windows 16GB RAM NVIDIA GPU. Mac with Apple silicon
